text: The following is a list of notable deaths in January 2018. For notable deaths before the current month, please see "Months". Names under each date are reported in alphabetical order by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non-humans are reported here also if notable. Each listing of a death must have a source. If no reference is included, the death notice will be removed. The following are the requirements of adding a name to the list in its order: name, age, nationality, what the person is known for, cause of death (if known) and most importantly a source. ==January== ===1=== *Gert Brauer, 62, German footballer (FC Carl Zeiss Jena).Trauer um ehemaligen FCC-Spieler Gert Brauer *Jahn Otto Johansen, 83, Norwegian editor (Morgenposten, Dagbladet).Jahn Otto Johansen er død *Robert Mann, 97, American violinist and composer, founding member of the Juilliard String Quartet. *Ebrahim Nafae, 83, Egyptian journalist (Al-Ahram), lung cancer. *Manuel Olivencia, 88, Spanish economist and diplomat, Commissioner General of Seville Expo '92 (1984–1991), respiratory failure complicated from a fall.Muere Manuel Olivencia, eminencia del Derecho Mercantil internacional *Mauro Staccioli, 80, Italian sculptor, complications from pneumonia.Lutto nell'arte: è morto lo scultore Staccioli *Tim Sweeney, 88, Irish hurler (Galway). ===2=== *Małgorzata Bocheńska, 69, Polish journalist.Małgorzata Bocheńska nie żyje. Dziennikarka TVP i Polsatu miała 69 lat. Kim była? *Frank Buxton, 87, American actor (Batfink, Overboard, What's Up, Tiger Lily?), screenwriter (Hot Dog) and director (The Odd Couple, Happy Days, Mork and Mindy), complications from heart disease. *Emily Dole, 60, American professional wrestler (GLOW). *Rick Hall, 85, American songwriter ("Achin', Breakin' Heart", "She'll Never Know") and recording producer-owner (FAME Studios), prostate cancer."Father of Muscle Shoals Music" dead at 85". *Ferdinando Imposimato, 81, Italian judge (International Criminal Court) and politician, member of the Chamber of Deputies (1987–1996) and 2015 presidential candidate. *Lawal Kaita, 85, Nigerian politician, Governor of Kaduna State (1983), liver failure. *Guida Maria, 67, Portuguese actress (The Miracle Worker, The Vows, A Única Mulher), pancreatic cancer.Morreu a atriz Guida Maria *Ali Akbar Moinfar, 89, Iranian politician, MP (1980–1984) and Minister of Petroleum (1979–1980), kidney failure.Zanganeh expresses grief over demise of Moinfar *Thomas S. Monson, 90, American religious leader and writer, President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (since 2008) and President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles (1995–2008). *Michael Pfeiffer, 92, German football player (national team) and manager (Roda JC Kerkrade, Alemannia Aachen).Alemannia-Legende Michel Pfeiffer im Alter von 92 Jahren gestorben ===3=== *Fred Bass, 89, American bookseller (Strand Bookstore), congestive heart failure. ===4=== *Aharon Appelfeld, 85, Romanian- born Israeli writer (Badenheim 1939, The Immortal Bartfuss, Blooms of Darkness) and Holocaust survivor.Décès de l’écrivain israélien Aharon Appelfeld, survivant de la Shoah *Johannes Brost, 71, Swedish actor (Rederiet, Jönssonligan, Bröllopsfotografen), pancreatic cancer.Johannes Brost är död *Brendan Byrne, 93, American politician, Governor of New Jersey (1974–1982), lung infection. *Bruce Halle, 87, American auto parts executive and Conservative philanthropist, founder of Discount Tire. *Senichi Hoshino, 70, Japanese Hall of Fame baseball player (Chunichi Dragons) and manager (Chunichi Dragons, Hanshin Tigers, Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles), pancreatic cancer.星野仙一氏死去 がん闘病…「燃える男」「闘将」突然すぎる７０歳 *Philipp Jenninger, 85, German politician, President of the Bundestag (1984–1988).Ex-Bundestagspräsident Jenninger ist tot *Ray Thomas, 76, American singer-songwriter ("From Mighty Oaks", "Veteran Cosmic Rocker", "For My Lady") and flautist (The Moody Blues), prostate cancer. *Vladimir Yankilevsky, 79, Russian artist (Soviet Nonconformist Art), leukemia. ===5=== *Antonio Valentín Angelillo, 80, Argentine-born Italian football player (Inter Milan, Argentina national team, Milan) and manager (Arezzo, FAR Rabat, Morocco national team), lung cancer. *Aydın Boysan, 96, Turkish architect and novelist (Aldanmak, Yıl 2046 Uzay Anıları, Yollarda), multiple organ failure.Aydın Boysan vefat etti *Carlos Heitor Cony, 91, Brazilian journalist (Folha de S.Paulo) and writer, multiple organ failure.Carlos Heitor Cony morre aos 91 anos *Asghar Khan, 96, Pakistani politician and military officer, Commander-in-Chief of the Air Force (1957–1965) and Chairman of the Tehrik-e-Istiqlal (1970–2011), complications from Parkinson's disease. *Marián Labuda, 73, Slovak actor (Dobří holubi se vracejí, Life and Extraordinary Adventures of Private Ivan Chonkin, The Garden).Zemřel slovenský herec Marián Labuda, řidič Pávek z Vesničky *Marina Ripa Di Meana, 76, Italian writer (I miei primi quarant'anni, La più bella del reame), television personality and director (Cattive ragazze), deep palliative sedation.Morta Marina Ripa di Meana *Arthur Rorheim, 99, American Baptist minister, co-founder of Awana. *Jerry Van Dyke, 86, American actor (My Mother the Car, The Dick Van Dyke Show, Coach) and comedian, heart failure. *Peter Wells, 88, British-born New Zealand athlete. *John W. Young, 87, American astronaut (Apollo 16, STS-1), complications from pneumonia. ===6=== *Horace Ashenfelter, 94, American Hall of Fame athlete, Olympic champion (1952). *Thomas Bopp, 68, American astronomer, co-discoverer of Comet Hale–Bopp.Thomas Bopp, codécouvreur de la comète Hale-Bopp nous a quitté *Rita Crocker Clements, 86, American political organizer, First Lady of Texas (1979–1983, 1987–1991), complications from Alzheimer's disease. *Peter Preston, 79, British columnist (The Observer) and journalist, editor of The Guardian (1975–1995), melanoma. *Greta Thyssen, 90, Danish-born American actress (Bus Stop, Journey to the Seventh Planet, The Three Stooges), body-double (Marilyn Monroe) and model, pneumonia. *Dave Toschi, 86, American police detective (Zodiac Killer), inspiration for Dirty Harry, complications from Alzheimer's disease. *Chris Tsangarides, 61, British music producer (Black Sabbath, Judas Priest, Thin Lizzy), heart failure complicated from pneumonia. *Frank Varrichione, 85, American football player (Pittsburgh Steelers, Los Angeles Rams), skin cancer. ===7=== *Jim Anderton, 79, New Zealand politician, Deputy Prime Minister (1999–2002), MP (1984–2011) and Leader of the Progressive Party (1979–1984). *France Gall, 70, French singer ("Laisse tomber les filles", "Poupée de cire, poupée de son", "Ella, elle l'a"), Eurovision winner (1965), infection complicated from cancer of unknown primary origin.Mort de France Gall, une chanteuse qui donnait tout pour la musique *Anna Mae Hays, 97, American military officer and nurse, Chief of Army Nurse Corps (1967–1971), complications from a heart attack. *Marjorie Holt, 97, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Maryland's 4th congressional district (1973–1987).Obituary: Marjorie S. Holt *Markku Into, 72, Finnish poet (Tuonela Rock, Tuskin tulee ilta, Raivoava takakirves), Eino Leino Prize winner (2001), cerebral hemorrhage.TS: Suomalaisen undergroundin ikoni Markku Into on kuollut *Peter Sutherland, 71, Irish banker (Goldman Sachs) and politician, Attorney General (1981–1982, 1982–1984) and Director-General of the World Trade Organization (1993–1995). ===8=== *Juan Carlos García, 29, Honduran footballer (Marathón, Olimpia, national team), leukemia. *Denise LaSalle, 78, American blues singer-songwriter ("Trapped by a Thing Called Love"), complications from a fall and heart disease. *Vojtěch Lindaur, 60, Czech journalist, radio host (Radio Beat) and record producer.Po dlouhé nemoci zemřel hudební publicista Vojtěch Lindaur. Bylo mu 60 let *George Maxwell Richards, 86, Trinidadian politician, President (2003–2013), congestive heart failure. *Donnelly Rhodes, 80, Canadian actor (Soap, Battlestar Galactica, Da Vinci's Inquest), liver cancer. ===9=== *Bob Bailey, 75, American baseball player (Montreal Expos, Pittsburgh Pirates, Los Angeles Dodgers). *Robert Minlos, 86, Russian mathematician.In memoriam. Роберт Адольфович Минлос (28.02.1931 - 09.01.2018) *Odvar Nordli, 90, Norwegian politician, Prime Minister (1976–1981), prostate cancer.Odvar Nordli er død *Yılmaz Onay, 80, Turkish novelist (Evlerde Uyur Uyanık Yalanlar) and stage director (Fear and Misery of the Third Reich), stomach cancer.Son dakika haberi… Tiyatrocu yazar Yılmaz Onay hayatını kaybetti *Kato Ottio, 23, Papua New Guinean rugby league footballer (national team), suspected cardiac arrest. *Ted Phillips, 84, English footballer (Ipswich Town, Leyton Orient, Colchester United), dementia. *Milton J. Rosenberg, 92, American psychology professor (University of Chicago) and radio host (WGN), complications from pneumonia. ===10=== *Eddie Clarke, 67, British heavy metal guitarist (Motörhead, Fastway), pneumonia. *Mikhail Derzhavin, 81, Russian actor (Three Men in a Boat, Investigation Held by ZnaToKi, Old Hags).Умер народный артист Михаил Державин *Tommy Lawrence, 77, Scottish footballer (Liverpool, Tranmere Rovers, national team).Tommy Lawrence: Tributes are paid to former Liverpool goalkeeper who died aged 77 *Tom Luken, 92, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Ohio's 1st congressional district (1974–1975, 1977–1991) and Mayor of Cincinnati (1971–1972).Cincinnati political legend Thomas Luken is dead *Doreen Tracey, 74, English-born American actress (The Mickey Mouse Club), pneumonia complicated from cancer. ===11=== *Doug Barnard, Jr., 95, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Georgia's 10th congressional district (1977–1993), pneumonia. *Stephane Gauger, 48, Vietnamese-born American movie director (Owl and the Sparrow), stroke. *Edgar Ray Killen, 92, American Ku Klux Klan leader and convicted murderer (Murders of Chaney, Goodman, and Schwerner). *Takis Loukanidis, 80, Greek footballer (Doxa Drama, Panathinaikos, national team), heart attack. ===12=== *Eddy Beugels, 73, Dutch cyclist, UCI Road World silver medalist (1966).Oud-profwielrenner Eddy Beugels overleden *Bella Emberg, 80, British actress (The Russ Abbot Show, The Benny Hill Show, Bear Behaving Badly). *Keith Jackson, 89, American sportscaster (ABC Sports, Wide World of Sports). *Jean-Louis Koszul, 97, French mathematician (Koszul complex), member of the French Academy of Sciences (since 1980).Décès de Jean-Louis Koszul *Pierre Pincemaille, 61, French organist, lung cancer.Allen, le naufrage de la musique d'église *Doodhnath Singh, 81, Indian writer (Sukhant, Aakhri Kalaam, Yamgatha), prostate cancer. *John V. Tunney, 83, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from California's 38th congressional district (1965–1971) and U.S. Senator (1971–1977), prostate cancer. *Frankie Muse Freeman, 101, American civil rights lawyer and activist ===13=== *Doug Harvey, 87, American Hall of Fame baseball umpire (MLB), esophageal cancer. *Byron Langley, 91, American politician, member of the North Dakota House of Representatives (1973–1980) and State Senator (1985–1996), complications from Alzheimer's disease. *Tzimis Panousis, 63, Greek rock musician ("Mousikes Taxiarhies", "Kaggela Pantou", "Digma Dorean") and stand-up comedian, heart attack. *Jean Porter, 95, American actress (Abbott and Costello in Hollywood, Betty Co-Ed, Cry Danger). *Eliyahu Winograd, 91, Israeli judge, member of the Supreme Court of Israel (1996), respiratory failure. ===14=== *Dan Gurney, 86, American racing driver (All American Racing), race car constructor, and team owner, complications from pneumonia. *Max Labovitch, 93, Canadian ice hockey player (New York Rangers). *Spanky Manikan, 75, Filipino actor (Himala, Behind Enemy Lines, Majika), lung cancer. *Erling Mandelmann, 82, Danish Regis, 59, English footballer (West Brom, Coventry City, national team), cardiac arrest. *Hugh Wilson, 74, American director (WKRP in Cincinnati, Police Academy, The First Wives Club) and television activist and trade unionist, complications from a stroke.Умер лидер уличных протестов 90-х Виктор Анпилов *Carl Emil Christiansen, 80, Danish footballer (Esbjerg fB).Carl Emil Christiansen *Joe Frank, born American HIV/AIDS researcher (amfAR), recipient of the Presidential Medal of Freedom (2000). *Karl-Heinz Kunde, 80, German racing cyclist.Trauer um Karl-Heinz Kunde *Dolores O'Riordan, 46, Irish singer-songwriter ("Are You Listening?", "No Baggage"), rock guitarist (The Cranberries, D.A.R.K.) and television personality (The Voice of Ireland), accidental drowning. *Óscar Pérez, 36, Venezuelan policeman and political activist, responsible for the Caracas helicopter incident, shot. *Roderick Rijnders, 76, Dutch coxswain, Olympic silver medalist (1968).In memoriam: Rody Rijnders *Peter Wyngarde, 90, British actor (Department S, Jason King, Flash Gordon). ===16=== *Bill Bain, 80, American management consultant, founder of Bain & Company, complications from Alzheimer's disease. Wrote), complications from pneumonia. *Anatoly Glushenkov, 75, Russian politician, Governor of Smolensk Oblast (1993–1998).Умер бывший губернатор Смоленской области Анатолий Глушенков *Kingdon Gould Jr., 94, American diplomat, Ambassador to Luxembourg (1969–1972) and the Netherlands (1973–1976), pneumonia. *Peter Groeger, 84, German actor (Blaulicht, Polizeiruf 110, Gute Zeiten, schlechte Zeiten).Schauspieler und Regisseur Peter Groeger ist tot *Madalena Iglésias, 78, Portuguese actress (Uma hora de Amor, Canção da Saudade, Sarilho de fraldas) and singer ("Ele e ela"), Eurovision contestant (1966).Morreu Madalena Iglésias *Oliver Ivanović, 64, Kosovar politician, State Secretary of the Ministry for Kosovo and Metohija (2008–2012), shot. *John Spellman, 91, American politician, ad Anna Campori del Corsaro Nero *Olivia Cole, 75, American actress (Roots, Backstairs at the White House, Brewster Place), Emmy Award winner (1977), heart attack. *Saqi Farooqi, 81, Pakistani poet. Santana, 27, American rapper ("Trappin Ain't Dead"), kidney failure complicated from seizure. *Allison Shearmur, 54, American movie producer (The Hunger Games, Rogue One, Cinderella), complications *Graeme Langlands, 76, Australian rugby league footballer (St. George Dragons, national team), complications from dementia. *Naomi Parker, 96, American naval machinist, inspiration for the "We Can Do It!" poster. *Jim Rodford, 76, English musician (Argent, The Kinks, The Zombies), complications from a fall. *Miyako Sumiyoshi, 30, Japanese Olympic speed skater (2014).Japanerin Sumiyoshi mit 30 Jahren gestorben ===21=== *Yves Afonso, 73, French actor (Masculin Féminin, The Clockmaker, Week End).Yves Afonso est mort à l'âge de 73 ans *Chartchai Chionoi, 75, Thai boxer (WBC, WBA), pneumonia complicated by Parkinson's disease.Ex-champion Chartchai Chionoi dies *Bruno Giacosa, 88, Italian winemaker (Azienda Agricola Falletto), complications from a stroke. *Tsukasa Hosaka, 80, Japanese footballer (Furukawa Electric, Kofu, national team), pneumonia.元サッカー日本代表の保坂司氏が死去 ８０歳 東京五輪メンバー *Jens Okking, 78, Danish actor (The Kingdom, One-Hand Clapping) and politician, MEP (1999–2003).Skuespiller Jens Okking er død *Connie Sawyer, 105, American actress (Dumb and Dumber, When Harry Met Sally, Pineapple Express), heart attack. ===22=== *Jimmy Armfield, 82, English football player (Blackpool, national team), manager (Leeds United) and pundit (BBC Radio 5 Live), world champion (1966), non-Hodgkin lymphoma. *Billy Hancock, 71, American rockabilly singer ("Shakin' That Rockabilly Fever", "Wanted: True Rock 'n' Roll") and guitarist (Billy Hancock & the Tennessee Rockets), complications from cirrhosis.Billy Hancock, rockabilly performer with outrageous style, dies at 71 *Reinier Kreijermaat, 82, Dutch footballer (Feyenoord, USV Elinkwijk, Xerxes/DHC).Feyenoord-icoon Reinier Kreijermaat (82) overleden *Ursula K. Le Guin, 88, American science fiction writer (A Wizard of Earthsea, The Left Hand of Darkness, The Dispossessed), suspected heart attack. *William Joseph McDonough, 83, American economist and banker, President of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York (1993–2003), heart failure.Ex-New York Fed Chief McDonough Dies; Led Bank During LTCM, 9/11 ===23=== *Mohammed Al-Mfarah, 72, Saudi Arabian actor (Al-Saknat Fe Klobna, Secretary in the House, Bokor Wa kolampor), laryngeal cancer.وفاة الفنان السعودي «محمد المفرح» الشهير بـ«أبو مسامح» *Hugh Masekela, 78, South African jazz trumpeter ("Grazing in the Grass"), prostate cancer. *Nicanor Parra, 103, Chilean poet.Nicanor Parra, Chile's eminent poet and 'anti-poet,' dies at 103 *Wyatt Tee Walker, 88, American civil rights activist (Congress of Racial Equality) and pastor, Executive Director of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference (1960–1964). *Lari White, 52, American country singer-songwriter ("Now I Know", "That's My Baby", "Stepping Stone") and actress (Cast Away), peritoneal cancer. ===24=== *Marcos Carvajal, 33, Venezuelan baseball player (Colorado Rockies, Florida Marlins), pneumonia.El ex grandes liga Marcos Carvajal falleció víctima de una pulmonía *Gonzalo Facio Segreda, 99, Costa Rican politician, Minister of Foreign Affairs (1970–1978), President of the Legislative Assembly (1953–1956), Ambassador to the United States (1956–1958, 1962–1966, 1990–1994), pneumonia complicated by Alzheimer's disease.Fallece Gonzalo Facio Segreda a sus 99 años de edad *Renaud Gagneux, 70, French composer, complications from ALS.Disparition du compositeur Renaud Gagneux *Jack Ketchum, 71, American novelist (The Girl Next Door) and screenwriter (Offspring, XX), pancreatic cancer. *Mark E. Smith, 60, English singer- songwriter (The Fall), lung and kidney cancer. ===25=== *Claribel Alegría, 93, Nicaraguan poet.Muere la poeta nicaragüense Sofía Claribel Alegría *Neagu Djuvara, 101, Okabe, 76, Japanese swimmer, Olympic bronze medalist (1964), pneumonia.東京五輪銅メダリスト、岡部幸明氏が死去 ===27=== *Robert McCormick Adams, Jr., 91, American anthropologist, Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution (1984–1994). *Royal Galipeau, 71, Canadian politician, MP (2006–2015), multiple myeloma. *Ingvar Kamprad, 91, Swedish businessman, founder of IKEA, pneumonia.Ingvar Kamprad har gått bort *Dennis title: Deaths in January 2018
